prompt: Find the most cited paper about 'LLM Agents' from 2023 or 2024. Create a document 'Paper_Summary.md' in the 'General' folder with the title, authors, and a summary of the abstract. Report the document ID.
gold_response: I found the paper 'The Rise of LLM Agents: A Survey of Recent Advances' by John Doe and Jane Smith. I created 'Paper_Summary.md' (ID: doc007) in the 'General' folder with the summary.

rubric.criteria: The agent must search for papers about 'LLM Agents' from 2023 or 2024.
The agent must identify 'The Rise of LLM Agents: A Survey of Recent Advances' as the target paper.
The agent must create a document named 'Paper_Summary.md' in the 'General' folder.
The document content must include the title, authors, and a summary of the abstract.
The agent must report the document ID of the created file.
